Articles.Content:
I thought this might be covered under the support section, but thought I should come here first. My question is simple - Where are the fairing parts? I'm playing on Windows, using the Steam version and I have reinstalled twice, and verified the integrity of the game 5 times now and still cannot find the fairing parts. The game is (obviously) fully stock. Any help appreciated!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T08:10:52Z" title="04/28/2015 08:10  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by ToTheMun**

They're under aerodynamic, and they are really there. Right up in the default menu near some nose-cones... first few lines. If you can't find them, they LOOK like nose-cones ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

They are procedural, so you only need one part.

Thank you so much!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I literally spent hours trying to find these XDD So deceitful that they made them look like nosecones...
